rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Minimalist entry space with Vastu-aligned north entrance for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area that includes seating and entertainment zone; positioned in the east or south region to ensure brightness and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-plan kitchen adjacent to living area; designed for ease of access and minimalistic functionality. Equipped with an integrated island.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom located near the entrance for guest privacy; includes built-in storage and natural lighting.

openings.description: Large windows for ample natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; positioned in the south-west for optimal privacy and Vastu balance.

rooms.name: Bedroom Two
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with natural light and ample space for personalization.

rooms.name: Bedroom Three
rooms.description: Additional bedroom in the duplex; designed to meet minimalist aesthetics.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom located centrally with water-efficient fixtures.

openings.description: Window openings designed for cross ventilation and sunlight.
Balcony providing access to the garden view.
